title: Why is there an Ahri nerf???
body: I just wanted to say that Ahri should NOT be receiving a nerf, just because her play rates and win rates have suddenly spiked, people just need to adapt to playing against her, as most people probably have not played against an Ahri many times. It's not her damage that makes her win rates so high, it's the enemy's inability to play against an Ahri. Just wanted to say, because I happen to be an Ahri main, and this nerf just didn't seem fair to me or other Ahri players.

replies.body: As an Ahri main i am obviously not happy about the nerf, but i do understand where riot is coming from, she is very strong at the moment. i just hope that these changes don't put her down to the point she was a few years ago.

It's kinda a tweak. They shifted more power to her E.

Basically this change is going to let Good Ahris dominate and punish bad Ahris

The nerf is legit 5% AP ratio...

Her W lost 10% but her E gained 10%. Her ult lost 5%.

They moved a tiny bit of her power from her "free" W that auto targets to a skilshot so in order to do damage you need to be good. Nothing wrong with that.

Another mindless nerf. I can understand shifting some power from W to E but they shouldn't nerf her ultimate.

Just because a champion is popular or Faker played it at MSI doesn't mean just nerf it.

Do they have to nerf things in every patch? Balance team, please hire someone like Scarra or LS for advice before nerfing everything.

As has been said in other comments, they moved power from her W AND her Ult to her E. It was a rebalance not a nerf overall. It shifts her power so that the people that are actually good with Ahri are still as potent as she can be now (which is very much so) but so that as a champion she doesn't reward sub-par play just by virtue of having abilities that can't be avoided.

As BarryButcher said. "Her W lost 10% but her E gained 10%. Her ult lost 5%."

There is no need to nerf the ultimate.

Mmm the impact of 5% really isn't that much in the grand scheme of things though, I think it's a step in the right direction to be honest, a slight change that will push for people to be better at Ahri to do well with her, without really changing her all that much.
Ahri has 3 dashes, 2 lock on abilities, and a 3 second stun. Thanks for the nerf Riot
